display_name: PSG Results: Calculated - RDI with arousals (>= 5% desaturation)
description: missing if total sleep time is 5 or if studies scored as sleep/wake or where arousals were ignored
calculation: rdim5pa = 60*(hremba5 +hroa5 + hnrba5 + hnroa5 +carba5+ caroa5 + canba5 + canoa5 + oarba5 + oaroa5 + oanba5 + oanoa5 + marbpa5 + maropa5 + manrbpa5 + manropa5)/slpprdp
